name: Action and Despair
description:
A game about being a gladiator whose fate rely on the dice and cards. Roll for new weapons each round and draw cards that will determine your fate!

Made for the MizJam1, total work of around 28 hours done over the course of a week.

Twitter: @Gorka_Man

Special Thanks: Kenney, Brackeys, Key Mouse, Yadu Rajiv, FantasyNameGenerator, and you for playing!
